message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value you're adding. However, I can only commit to a maximum of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $105.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider $100?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell at $100, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I'll offer the product to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I really appreciate it. I'm still aiming to keep within my budget. Would $105 be possible?
